text: William Patrick Glynn (9 July 1900 – 14 April 1978) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Bill Glynn's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1900 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Bill Glynn (footballer)
